description.value: A xulgath bomber's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until the next time they make their daily preparations.

30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 24 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2, and on a critical failure, the creature is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} 1 for as long as it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths’ stenches for 1 minute.

The @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition from concentrated xulgath bile doesn’t improve on its own until the target recovers from the poison. A target who recovers from concentrated xulgath bile is immune to being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} by this poison for 1 minute
Saving Throw Fortitude DC 22
Maximum Duration 6 rounds
Stage 1 [[/r 1d10 # poison damage]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1 (1 round);
Stage 2 [[/r 2d10 # poison damage]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2 (1 round);
Stage 3 [[/r 2d10 # poison damage]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 3 (1 round).
The bomber Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.
